§ 50114. Administration of commercial space centers The Administrator shall administer the Commercial Space Center program in a coordinated manner from Administration headquarters in Washington, D.C. (Pub. L. 111–314, § 3, Dec. 18, 2010, 124 Stat. 3398.)
